name: Lover's Cards
description:
Spark up your love life with Lover's Cards

WHAT IS LOVER'S CARDS?
Lover's Cards is a beautiful card game that will surely give you a romantic night in with your partner.

The game is easy - Face each other and take it in turns to select a card from the deck. The card will give you a task, you must either perform the task immediately or for the future cards, plan to do it shortly in the future.

FEATURES
- Huge amount of tasks
- Guaranteed to add a spark to your love life
- Beautiful retina graphics for all your iOS devices
